verses.verse: <S%H7442>"Sing,<s%> <S%H6135>barren,<s%> you who <S%H3205>didn't<s%> bear; break <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>singing,<s%> and cry <S%H6670>aloud,<s%> you who did not travail with <S%H2342>child:<s%> for <S%H7227>more<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> than the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the married <S%H1166>wife,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7337>"Enlarge<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of your <S%H168>tent,<s%> and let them stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of your <S%H4908>habitations;<s%> <S%H2820>don't<s%> spare: <S%H748>lengthen<s%> your <S%H4340>cords,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3489>stakes.<s%>

For you shall spread <S%H6555>out<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and make the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to be <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

<S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid; for you shall not be <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> neither be <S%H3637>confounded;<s%> for you shall not be <S%H2659>disappointed:<s%> for you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H2659>shame<s%> of your <S%H5934>youth;<s%> and the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of your <S%H491>widowhood<s%> you shall remember no <S%H2142>more.<s%>

For your <S%H6213>Maker<s%> is your <S%H1166>husband;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name:<s%> and the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is your <S%H1350>Redeemer;<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> shall he be <S%H7121>called.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> you as a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> even a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when she is cast <S%H3988>off,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
"For a <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> have I <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H1419>you;<s%> but with great <S%H7356>mercies<s%> will I gather <S%H6908>you.<s%>

In <S%H8241>overflowing<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from you for a <S%H7281>moment;<s%> but with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> will I have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H559>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer.<s%>

"For this is like the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> to <S%H7650>me;<s%> for as I have sworn that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> shall no more go <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> so have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that I will not be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H1605>you,<s%> nor rebuke you.

For the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> may <S%H4185>depart,<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> be <S%H4131>removed;<s%> but my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from <S%H1285>you,<s%> neither shall my covenant of <S%H7965>peace<s%> be <S%H4131>removed,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who has mercy on <S%H7355>you.<s%>

"You <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> tossed with <S%H5162>storms,<s%> and not comforted, <S%H7257>behold,<s%> I will set your <S%H68>stones<s%> in beautiful <S%H6320>colors,<s%> and <S%H7257>lay<s%> your <S%H3245>foundations<s%> with <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H8121>pinnacles<s%> of <S%H3539>rubies,<s%> and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> of sparkling <S%H68>jewels,<s%> and all your <S%H1366>walls<s%> of <S%H2656>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>
All your <S%H1121>children<s%> shall be <S%H3928>taught<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> shall be the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of your <S%H1121>children.<s%>

In <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> you shall be <S%H3559>established:<s%> you shall be <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> for you shall not be <S%H3372>afraid;<s%> and from <S%H4288>terror,<s%> for it shall not come near <S%H7126>you.<s%>
<S%H1481>Behold,<s%> they may gather <S%H1481>together,<s%> but <S%H657>not<s%> by <S%H4310>me:<s%> whoever shall gather <S%H1481>together<s%> against you shall fall because of <S%H5307>you.<s%>

<S%H1254>"Behold,<s%> I have created the <S%H2796>smith<s%> who <S%H5301>blows<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6352>coals,<s%> and brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H3627>weapon<s%> for his <S%H4639>work;<s%> and I have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H7843>waster<s%> to <S%H2254>destroy.<s%>

No <S%H3627>weapon<s%> that is <S%H3335>formed<s%> against you will <S%H6743>prevail;<s%> and you will <S%H7561>condemn<s%> every <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H6965>rises<s%> against you in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> This is the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and their <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> which is of <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
